dek: Tracking the popularity of cultural figures in 2018.
prelude: We are tracking how much and how often famous people are in the media spotlight, according to Wikipedia traffic. Here are the top 10 each day in 2018, across all industries:
tally: There’s more to popularity than daily rankings, however. Below, we’ve visualized the number of times that cultural figures have entered the top 10, as a way of showing their overall popularity in 2018 thus far.
categoryHed: Number of Top 10 Appearances in 2018 by Occupation

method.value: Data for this story is collected daily using the Wikipedia API (English only). The yearly aggregation of notable births (e.g., 1950) was the starting point to decide who is considered a celebrity or not (a foundation of over 40,000 people). The full source is available on Github.
Occupations are assigned based on the first match in the person’s description (e.g., if the description is “basketball player, actor” they are listed “sports”).
